5D201C8E.Line1.B20BA: It was consumed by fire in the months that followed Astaroth’s defeat. Some thought the demon had returned. Others were wiser.

91090F92.Line5.B20BA: Strong souls who had survived so much… all extinguished by day’s rise.

F7149610.Line3.B20BA: Blackweald Company visited the town the day it burned. The charred remains proved their hand in the deed.
